name: pwa-chrfonts
author: RodrigoDornelles
description: run in your browser! thats a editor utility to change your fonts sprites in tilesets and homebrews/rackrom games.

scripts.build: bun run build:before && bun build --minify --outdir dist --target browser --asset-naming '[name].[ext]' --entry-naming '[name].[ext]' src/worker.ts src/main.ts public/*
scripts.build:before: mkdir -p dist && cp assets/* dist && cp manifest.json dist
